Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Election season isn't quite over yet! As a current member of the ACLU of South Carolina, you are eligible to vote for who will join our board of directors for a three-year term starting in January 2019.

These six great nominees each offer their own unique experiences and perspectives that will be invaluable in guiding the ACLU of South Carolina into the future.

You will need your ACLU membership number to vote.

Membership Number: ##account_number[Please contact us to obtain your membership number at info@aclusc.org.]##

VOTE TODAY

If you have questions or would prefer to receive a paper ballot, contact us at info@aclusc.org no later than Saturday, December 10. Electronic and paper ballots must be received no later than midnight, December 31.

Thank you for your support,

ACLU of South Carolina
